descriptions.Description: To test stitching output of far/near overlook and perspective with 4 pre-shot images
descriptions.Test Method: Interface test and requirement test(3 TMQ interfaces simulation and image histogram similarity check)
descriptions.Pass Criteria: 1, Output message's content and number are as expected. 2, Histogram similarity between actual and expected images is greater than 90%.
